Package maltcms.commands.filters.array

Class Summary
AArrayFilter AArrayFilter applicable to Array objects, returning Array objects.
AdditionFilter Add a given double to elements of an array.
AddRandomNoise Add additive gaussian noise to array values with given mean and std deviation.
ArrayMerge Returns a list of all arrays, processed to be consistent with this objects merging strategy.
BottomHatFilter  
ExpFilter Applies exp(x) to all elements of an array.
FirstDerivativeFilter Calculate first derivative on array stored in a new array.
LogFilter Applies log10 or ln to all elements of an array.
MeanStdDevNormalizationFilter Normalize all values of an array given a normalization string.
MedianBaselineFilter Estimate a local baseline using a windowed median and perform baseline subtraction.
MinimumFilter This class will set all elements smaller than minimum to zero.
MinMaxNormalizationFilter Normalize all values of an array given a normalization string.
MovingAverageFilter  
MovingMedianFilter  
MultiplicationFilter Multiply a value with all values of an array.
NormalizationFilter Normalize all values of given arrays to the interval of 0..1, given min and max values.
SavitzkyGolayFilter  
SqrtFilter Will squar all elements.
TopHatFilter
